metadata.title: CVE-2021-21125 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in File System API in Google Chrome onWindows prior to 88.0.4324.96 allowed a remote attacker to bypassfilesystem restrictions via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
